description:
The Red Hat Enterprise Linux Atomic Tools container image includes hundreds of software tools for troubleshooting and investigating a Red Hat Enterprise Linux Atomic Host system. This container allows you to interact directly with the system to uncover and solve problems. Inside the container are popular tools such as sosreport, kdump, and many others (most of which are not installed on Red Hat Enterprise Linux Atomic Host).

New package:
RHBA-2015:2122 subscription-manager-plugin-container-1.15.9-15.el7.x86_64
All users who require the Red Hat Enterprise Linux Atomic Tools container are advised to install this updated container image.
solution:
The Red Hat Enterprise Linux container image provided by this update can be
downloaded from the Red Hat Container Registry at registry.access.redhat.com
using the "docker pull" command. Dockerfiles and scripts should be amended
either to refer to this new image specifically, or to the latest image
generally.
summary:
An updated Red Hat Enterprise Linux Atomic Tools container image is now
available.
title: Red Hat Enterprise Linux Atomic 7.2.7 Tools Container Image Update
